scene.name: Huarongdao puzzle setup
scene.description: A Huarongdao wooden board with blocks in an initial neat arrangement

task.name: Scramble and restore Huarongdao
task.description: Randomly slide blocks to scramble the puzzle, then restore them to the original state
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will play Huarongdao. The goal is to scramble the blocks and then restore them to their original positions.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要玩华容道。目标是打乱棋子布局，然后将它们恢复原位。

subtasks.description: Execute the scrambling and restoring sequence
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please mess up the puzzle and then solve it back.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请打乱棋盘，然后再复原。

steps.description: Slide blocks randomly to scramble the layout
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: slide several blocks randomly to mess up the current layout.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：随意滑动几个棋子，打乱目前的布局。

steps.description: Slide blocks back to their original positions
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: slide the blocks back to restore the original layout.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：把刚才移动过的棋子滑回去，恢复最初的样子。

constraints.notes: Movements must be sliding only (no lifting); remember the moves in step 1 to successfully restore in step 2.
